summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 25904, entitled, "An Ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of an alley in Block Fifty-one (51), Gilman Park, an addition to the City of Seattle; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property included in Block Fifty-one (51), said Gilman Park, in the manner provided by law," approved December 19, 1910, and published December 24, 1910.
